EVERY_STORY.PARA1: At A-State Insurance, we believe everyone deserves coverage that fits their life, budget, and unique needs. From families to business owners, first-time buyers to long-time policyholders, our team ensures you have access to reliable protection. We offer support in English, Spanish, and Hindi, with multilingual agents ready to guide you through every insurance option with expertise and care.
EVERY_STORY.PARA2: As one of Texas's top insurance agencies, we understand the needs of the Hispanic and Latino communities and provide tailored support that respects their culture and priorities. No matter your background, situation, or type of insurance (auto, home, commercial, life, health, or bonds), we make it simple to find coverage that works for you. Our mission is to protect what matters most while making the process easy for every Texan.

STEP1.DESC: Call, visit, or contact us online today to start your personalized insurance journey with ease.

STEP2.TITLE: Get Advice

STEP4.TITLE: We've Got You

ITEMS.NAME: Valeria Esquivel
ITEMS.TEXT: Honestly, I was dreading shopping for car insurance, but Marisol made it so easy. She didn't just dump a bunch of policies on me; she sat down and explained how each one protected my kids. It felt like getting advice from a neighbor who actually cares.

ITEMS.NAME: Camila Castañeda
ITEMS.TEXT: Buying our first home was a whirlwind, and the insurance part was honestly the most confusing. I called and spoke with Diego, who took the time to explain what 'replacement cost' actually meant for our little 1950s bungalow.

ITEMS.NAME: Lucia Benavidez
ITEMS.TEXT: I’ve always known I needed life insurance for my kids, but I kept putting it off because the paperwork was so intimidating. Speaking with Gabriel changed everything. Being able to go back and forth between English and Spanish made it so much easier.

ITEMS.NAME: Ricardo Garza
ITEMS.TEXT: When we expanded our family restaurant, I knew our old coverage wouldn't cut it. Oscar sat down with me and looked at our specific risks. He didn't treat us like just another account; he treated us like a local business owner.

ITEMS.NAME: Ximena Montoya
ITEMS.TEXT: With three kids, I can’t afford to guess when it comes to doctors. Lucia was a godsend—she sat with me and literally compared the plans side-by-side until I knew exactly what my co-pays would look like.

ITEMS.NAME: Travis Calhoun
ITEMS.TEXT: I had a project start date looming and realized I didn't have the right bond to pull the permit. The team here didn't give me the runaround; they jumped right on it and got me squared away in time for my crew to start.

ITEMS.NAME: Sofia De La Cruz
ITEMS.TEXT: It’s hard to find an office where you don't feel like just another number. Gabriel really listened to our concerns about my parents and the kids. We left feeling like our whole family was finally seen and protected.

ITEMS.NAME: Travis Calhoun
ITEMS.TEXT: I was bracing myself for a total nightmare when my son got his license. But the folks at A-State were great. They showed me how 'good student' discounts worked. It felt more like a coaching session than a sales meeting.

ITEMS.NAME: Cassidy Thorne
ITEMS.TEXT: I’d been renting in Austin for years and was terrified of the jump to owning. The team at A-State Insurance didn't just give me a quote; they sat down and showed me exactly what I needed for my new place.

ITEMS.NAME: Diego Hinojosa
ITEMS.TEXT: I’ve been meaning to get life insurance since my youngest was born. Marisol was so different. She talked with me about my family’s goals. She explained things in a way that finally clicked.

COVERDBANNER.TITLE: Get Covered in Texas Today
COVERDBANNER.DESC: At A-State Insurance, we make protecting your home, car, business, or family simple and worry-free. Our experts compare multiple carriers to find coverage that fits your life perfectly. With clear guidance, multilingual support, and personalized service, we give Texans confidence. Insurance that fits your life, backed by experts who care, peace of mind starts here with A-State Insurance. You can call, email, text, fill out the form, or visit us in person. Getting the right protection has never been easier.

WHY_CHOOSE.HEADING: Our Insurance Services
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION: Driving every day? Road trips? Late-night food runs? A-State Insurance has your back. We provide reliable auto insurance services across Texas, offering drivers strong protection for accidents, theft, liability, and vehicle damage. We work with trusted carriers to find coverage that fits you. Our team makes the process simple with fast quotes, clear policies, and local support you can count on. With A-State Insurance, you get dependable Texas auto insurance and service that puts you first.

CARD1.TITLE: Car Insurance
CARD1.DESC: Get professional car insurance that covers crashes, theft, liability, and glass damage, with easy deductibles and proof when you need it.

CARD2.TITLE: Motorcycle Insurance
CARD2.DESC: Coverage for accidents, injuries, theft, and bike damage, designed to protect riders on highways, city roads, and long-distance trips.

CARD3.TITLE: Boat Insurance
CARD3.DESC: Protection for boats, passengers, and liability against storms, collisions, theft, and water-related risks at marinas or open waters.

CARD4.TITLE: RV & Motorhome Insurance
CARD4.DESC: Specialized protection for vintage vehicles with agreed value, restoration coverage, and pricing suited for limited-use driving.

CARD5.TITLE: Classic Car Insurance
CARD5.DESC: Get expert advice online or visit a familiar face at our local TX office—neighbors who know your community's needs.

CARD6.TITLE: Commercial Auto Insurance
CARD6.DESC: Policies for business vehicles covering drivers, cargo, accidents, and liability to support daily operations and service routes.

CARD7.TITLE: SR-22 Insurance
CARD7.DESC: Professional state-compliant filing and coverage that helps drivers meet legal requirements and maintain valid driving privileges.

CARD8.TITLE: ATV & UTV Insurance
CARD8.DESC: Coverage for off-road vehicles protecting against crashes, theft, liability, and transport-related risks on trails or properties.

CARD9.TITLE: Trailer Insurance
CARD9.DESC: Comprehensive insurance for utility, cargo, and equipment trailers, protecting against damage, loss, and hauling-related incidents.

CARD10.TITLE: Mexican Car Insurance
CARD10.DESC: Secure reliable Mexican auto insurance coverage to stay compliant with local laws and protect yourself financially while driving in Mexico.

CARD11.TITLE: Rideshare Insurance
CARD11.DESC: Get proper rideshare insurance coverage to ensure you are fully protected and financially secure while driving for companies like Uber or Lyft.

HOMEOWNERS.HEADING: Homeowners Insurance
HOMEOWNERS.DESCRIPTION: With homeowners' insurance, A-State Insurance gives you strong protection for your home, your belongings, and your budget. Get the best insurance services for common risks like fire, storms, theft, and vandalism, so unexpected damage doesn’t turn into a major expense. Your personal items, including furniture, appliances, and electronics, are also covered, so you’re not left replacing them on your own. Choose options at a price that makes sense, and know your home is backed by A-State Insurance.

CARD1.TITLE: Commercial Property Insurance
CARD1.DESC: Safeguard your building, equipment, and inventory from fire, storms, and theft with this insurance, keeping your business financially secure.

CARD2.TITLE: Landlord Insurance
CARD2.DESC: Protect your investment and your income. We cover tenant damage, legal claims, and lost rent so you can grow your Texas portfolio with confidence.

CARD3.TITLE: Condo Insurance
CARD3.DESC: Specialized coverage for condo owners that protects your unit, personal property, and liability while complementing your HOA's master policy.

CARD4.TITLE: Earthquake Insurance
CARD4.DESC: Get premium coverage with this insurance for earthquake-caused structural damage, debris removal, and rebuilding costs after seismic activity.

CARD5.TITLE: Manufactured Home / Mobile Home Insurance
CARD5.DESC: Tailored insurance coverage for manufactured and mobile homes that protects against fire, theft, weather damage, and liability.

CARD6.TITLE: Landlord Insurance
CARD6.DESC: Coverage designed for rental property owners that protects against property damage, loss of rental income, and liability claims.

CARD7.TITLE: Flood Insurance
CARD7.DESC: Specialized flood insurance to protect your home and belongings from water damage caused by flooding events.

COMMERCIAL.HEADING: Commercial Insurance
COMMERCIAL.DESCRIPTION: With Commercial insurance, A-State Insurance helps protect businesses against financial losses from property damage, lawsuits, employee injuries, vehicle accidents, and unexpected interruptions. It supports daily operations by covering buildings, equipment, inventory, and legal responsibilities. With flexible plans for different industries and business sizes, we help owners manage risks and control expenses. Our insurance plans provide strong protection, enabling companies to grow with confidence.

CARD1.TITLE: Professional Liability (E&O) Insurance
CARD1.DESC: Protects against claims of mistakes, missed deadlines, and professional errors that could lead to lawsuits or financial losses.

CARD2.TITLE: General Liability Insurance
CARD2.DESC: Covers third-party injuries, property damage, and legal costs, helping businesses of all sizes to avoid costly claims and court expenses.

CARD3.TITLE: Workers’ Compensation Insurance
CARD3.DESC: Provides medical benefits and wage support for employees injured at work while protecting employers from legal disputes or lawsuits.

CARD4.TITLE: Commercial Property Insurance
CARD4.DESC: Protects your building, equipment, furniture, signage, and inventory from fire, storms, theft, and vandalism, helping you continue operations quickly.

CARD5.TITLE: Commercial Auto Insurance
CARD5.DESC: Covers company-owned vehicles against accidents, liability claims, repairs, and medical expenses, ensuring your drivers and deliveries stay protected.

CARD6.TITLE: Business Owner’s Policy (BOP)
CARD6.DESC: Combines property and liability coverage into one affordable package to simplify protection, reduce costs, and support the needs of businesses.

CARD7.TITLE: Employment Practices Liability (EPLI) Insurance
CARD7.DESC: Protects your company from claims related to discrimination, harassment, wrongful termination, and workplace policy violations.

CARD8.TITLE: Cyber Liability Insurance
CARD8.DESC: Helps after data breaches, cyberattacks, or system failures by covering recovery costs, legal fees, customer notification, and reputation management.

CARD9.DESC: Covers structures under construction from fire, weather damage, theft, and vandalism, protecting materials, equipment, and investments.

CARD10.TITLE: Directors & Officers (D&O) Liability Insurance
CARD10.DESC: Protects company leaders from personal financial loss caused by management decisions, regulatory investigations, or shareholder lawsuits.

LIFE.HEADING: Life Insurance
LIFE.DESCRIPTION: At A-State Insurance, life insurance helps you secure dependable protection for your loved ones with plans matched to your needs and budget. In the event of a loss, coverage can help replace income, pay off debts, handle mortgage or rent payments, and support education and long-term family goals. We help you choose the right policy type and coverage amount, so you’re not paying for what you don’t need. Get a clear, straightforward quote and put a strong financial safety net in place today.

CARD1.TITLE: Term Life Insurance
CARD1.DESC: Provides affordable coverage for a set period, helping protect your family’s income, mortgage, and major expenses during important life stages.

CARD2.TITLE: Whole Life Insurance
CARD2.DESC: Offers lifelong coverage with built-in cash value, helping you protect loved ones while building long-term financial security.

CARD3.TITLE: Universal Life Insurance
CARD3.DESC: Combines flexible premiums with lifetime protection, allowing you to adjust coverage and savings as your financial needs change.

CARD4.TITLE: Final Expense Insurance
CARD4.DESC: Helps cover funeral and burial costs, medical bills, and small debts, this insurance assists in reducing financial stress for your family.

CARD5.TITLE: Variable Life Insurance
CARD5.DESC: Get affordable life coverage for employees, helping businesses support staff while providing financial security for their families.

CARD6.TITLE: Group Life Insurance
CARD6.DESC: Offers affordable life coverage for employees, helping businesses support staff while providing financial security for their families.

HEALTH.HEADING: Health Insurance
HEALTH.DESCRIPTION: At A-State Insurance, life insurance helps you secure dependable protection for your loved ones with plans matched to your needs and budget. In the event of a loss, coverage can help replace income, pay off debts, handle mortgagWith health coverage from A-State Insurance, you get plans built to keep care affordable and stress low. Our teams of experts help you choose coverage that fits your budget and medical needs, from doctor visits and prescriptions to hospital care, preventive services, and emergencies. Whether you need a plan for yourself, your family, or your employees, we compare options and guide you to the right benefits. Get a clear quote, simple support, and coverage you can count on.

CARD1.TITLE: Individual Health Insurance
CARD1.DESC: Provides personal medical coverage for doctor visits, prescriptions, preventive care, and emergency services, offering financial support and access.

CARD2.TITLE: Family Health Insurance
CARD2.DESC: Covers third-party injuries, property damage, and legal costs, helping businesses of all sizes to avoid costly claims and court expenses.

CARD4.DESC: Delivers medical benefits for organizations, supporting employee wellness, reducing turnover, and strengthening long-term workforce stability.

CARD5.TITLE: Travel Health Insurance
CARD5.DESC: Protects travelers from unexpected medical expenses, emergency treatment, and evacuation costs when traveling to other states or countries.

CARD6.TITLE: Medicare Supplement / Medigap Insurance
CARD6.DESC: Helps cover expenses not paid by Original Medicare, including deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, reducing healthcare-related financial stress.

CARD7.TITLE: Short-Term Health Insurance
CARD7.DESC: Offers temporary medical coverage during job changes, enrollment gaps, or life transitions, providing protection when permanent plans are unavailable.

CARD8.TITLE: Dental & Vision Insurance
CARD8.DESC: Covers routine exams, cleanings, glasses, contact lenses, and treatments, helping maintain oral health and clear vision at affordable rates.

CARD9.TITLE: ACA / Marketplace Plans
CARD9.DESC: Provides access to government-supported health plans with benefits, income-based subsidies, and coverage for preventive and major medical services.

SURETY.HEADING: Surety Bonds
SURETY.DESCRIPTION: A-State Insurance helps you secure surety bonds that meet licensing and contract requirements, so you can bid, build, and operate with confidence. From construction projects to permits and public contracts, we help you get the right bond fast, with competitive rates and smooth processing. These bonds protect project owners and agencies if obligations are not met, helping you build trust and win more work. Get in touch today to apply quickly and get bonded hassle-free.

CARD1.TITLE: Performance Bonds / Payment Bonds
CARD1.DESC: Guarantee project completion and timely payments to suppliers and subcontractors, protecting owners from financial loss and construction delays.

CARD2.TITLE: Commercial Surety Bonds
CARD2.DESC: Support business licensing, permits, and regulatory compliance, helping companies meet legal requirements and maintain professional credibility.

CARD3.TITLE: Bid Bonds
CARD3.DESC: Ensure contractors honor submitted bids and sign contracts when awarded, protecting project owners from unreliable proposals.

CARD4.TITLE: Notary Bonds
CARD4.DESC: Protect the public from errors, misconduct, or negligence by commissioned notaries, ensuring ethical and lawful document processing.

From personal interests to legal requirements, our comprehensive coverage and expert knowledge provide peace of mind across personal and business areas.

CARD1.DESC: Guarantee project completion and timely payments to suppliers and subcontractors, protecting owners from financial loss and construction delays.

HERO.HEADING: Protecting Texas Families and Businesses Since 2018

CARD1.TITLE: Local Expertise
CARD1.DESC: Our deep understanding of Texas communities and neighborhoods helps us reliably recommend insurance options that match local risks, regulations, and lifestyle needs for every client.

CARD2.TITLE: Personalized Service
CARD2.DESC: We tailor coverage plans to your life, business, and family priorities, ensuring you pay only for what you need while staying fully protected and supported.

CARD3.TITLE: Experienced Team
CARD3.DESC: Our team brings years of hands-on insurance knowledge, offering practical advice, clear guidance, and trusted expertise so clients feel confident in every coverage decision they make.

CARD4.TITLE: Trusted Reputation
CARD4.DESC: Texans rely on us for honesty, integrity, and dependable service; our strong reputation is built on transparent processes, consistent support, and real results across all coverage types.

CARD5.TITLE: Fast, Responsive Support
CARD5.DESC: From claims to general questions, our team responds quickly and efficiently, so you never have to wait for answers when your coverage, protection, or peace of mind matters most.

CARD1.TITLE: Company History and Establishment Year
CARD1.DESC: Founded in 2018, A-State Insurance began with a simple but impactful mission: to make insurance clear, accessible, and reliable for all Texans. From the start, we partnered with multiple carriers to provide personalized coverage for homes, vehicles, businesses, health, life, and surety bonds. Over the years, we’ve grown steadily while remaining fully committed to exceptional service, multilingual support, and an understanding of the unique needs of every individual and community we proudly serve across Texas.

CARD2.TITLE: Core Mission & Values
CARD2.DESC: At A-State Insurance, our mission is to provide Texans with insurance solutions built on trust, reliability, and clarity. We value strong relationships, personalized guidance, and serving every community with respect and care. By combining professional expertise with a commitment to honesty and support, we ensure clients feel confident, protected, and understood. Our focus is on helping families, businesses, and individuals secure the coverage they need while keeping the process simple and dependable.

CARD3.TITLE: Types of Clients Served
CARD3.DESC: A-State Insurance proudly serves a wide range of clients, including families, automobile owners, homeowners, and businesses of all sizes. We focus on building trust and providing reliable coverage tailored to each client’s unique needs. With a commitment to community and personalized service, our multilingual team ensures everyone feels supported, understood, and confident. From protecting homes and vehicles to safeguarding businesses and lives, we help Texans secure what matters most with care and integrity.

ACCEPTANCE.TITLE: Acceptance of Terms
ACCEPTANCE.P1: By using the A-State Insurance website, requesting a quote, or using any of our services, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. This applies to all visitors, clients, and anyone seeking insurance information. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the website or our services.
ACCEPTANCE.P2: Our goal is to make your experience clear and transparent. We want you to feel confident while browsing, requesting quotes, or purchasing coverage. These terms explain what you can expect from us and what we expect from you. By using our services, you accept this agreement, enabling us to provide the best possible support and insurance guidance.

ABOUT.TITLE: About A-State Insurance
ABOUT.P1: A-State Insurance is an independent insurance agency and broker in Texas. We are not an insurance company, and we do not underwrite policies. We work with multiple trusted carriers to help you find coverage that fits your needs, lifestyle, and budget. By using our website or services, you agree that we provide access to policies issued by third-party insurers.
ABOUT.P2: We offer personal and commercial coverage, including auto, home, life, health, and surety bonds. Our goal is to guide you through the process, answer your questions, and help you make confident decisions. These Terms show how we work and what you can expect from us.

USE.TITLE: Use of Website
USE.P1: Our website is designed to give you information and tools to compare insurance options. We explain coverage types, help you understand policies, and assist in requesting quotes. A-State Insurance does not issue policies. All coverage comes from third-party insurance companies.
USE.P2: The website is not a contract or guarantee of coverage. We aim to make insurance clear and easy to understand. You are responsible for reviewing information before making coverage decisions. We are here to guide you, answer questions, and provide advice that helps you find the right plan for your life or business. By using the website, you acknowledge our role.

DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Quotes & Coverage Disclaimer
DISCLAIMER.P1: Online quotes are only estimates. Final pricing depends on the carrier and underwriting approval. Coverage does not start until the policy is issued, payment is confirmed, and the carrier approves it. A-State Insurance helps you compare options and understand coverage, but the final decision and responsibility belong to you.
DISCLAIMER.P2: Quotes are intended to provide an estimate of coverage costs. They do not guarantee a policy or specific pricing. We provide guidance to help you make informed decisions, but coverage is not active until all carrier approvals are received. This ensures your insurance is fully valid and secure.

RESPONSIBILITY.TITLE: Insurance Policy Responsibility
RESPONSIBILITY.P1: Clients are responsible for reviewing all policy documents carefully. You should check coverage limits, deductibles, and exclusions. We explain the policies and answer questions, but you are responsible for confirming that your policy meets your needs. A-State Insurance is not liable for misunderstandings once the documents are provided. Our goal is to make the process clear and simple.
RESPONSIBILITY.P2: By carefully reviewing your documents, you can be confident that your coverage protects what matters most. We provide guidance and support every step of the way, helping you understand your coverage so there are no surprises.

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third-Party Insurance Providers
THIRD_PARTY.P1: All policies come from outside insurance companies. A-State Insurance helps you select coverage and navigate your options, but we do not make carrier decisions. We are not responsible for claims, cancellations, or financial issues with the insurance company.
THIRD_PARTY.P2: We act as your broker and guide, providing clear information and support while maintaining professional boundaries. Our job is to help you find the best policies and understand your coverage. Any issues with the insurance company must be handled directly with them. Our goal is to make the process as smooth and easy as possible for you.

PAYMENT.TITLE: Payment Terms
PAYMENT.P1: Premiums may be processed by the insurance company or approved payment partners. We do not control payment processing times. Late or missed payments may lead to policy suspension or cancellation. We provide reminders and guidance whenever possible, but it is your responsibility to ensure payment is made on time.
PAYMENT.P2: Coverage only becomes active once payment is received and approved. We aim to make payments simple and clear. Following these steps helps keep your insurance active without interruptions. Our team is here to answer questions if you have trouble with payments.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Communication Consent
COMMUNICATION.P1: By using our services, you agree to be contacted by phone, text, or email. Communication may include quotes, policy updates, renewals, or marketing information. You can opt out of marketing messages at any time by contacting us.
COMMUNICATION.P2: We use these communications to help you stay informed and supported, not to bother you. Our goal is to ensure you receive important updates and assistance with your insurance. You have full control over how and when you hear from us, and we respect your preferences.

BILINGUAL.TITLE: Bilingual Communication Disclaimer
BILINGUAL.P1: We provide services in English, Spanish, and Hindi. Translations are for convenience only. If there is a conflict between the translation and the original, the English policy documents are the official version. Our goal is to make insurance accessible and understandable while keeping official documentation accurate and legally valid. We strive to provide clear guidance in your preferred language.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy & Data Use Reference
PRIVACY.P1: Your personal information is collected only to provide quotes, service, or coverage guidance. We follow privacy laws, and our Privacy Policy explains how your data is handled. We only share information with carriers or partners necessary to provide coverage. Your data is used to help you find the best policies and ensure your coverage meets your needs. We take privacy seriously and aim to keep your information secure at all times.

INTELLECTUAL.TITLE: Intellectual Property
INTELLECTUAL.P1: All website content, logos, and branding belong to A-State Insurance. You may not copy, distribute, or reuse content without our permission. The materials are for informational and service purposes only. We want you to learn about insurance and make decisions with our guidance, but the content remains our property.

LIABILITY.TITLE: Limitation of Liability
LIABILITY.P1: A-State Insurance is not responsible for denied claims, website errors, or financial losses from using general information. We guide and assist you, but coverage decisions and results are ultimately the responsibility of the client and the carrier. We provide accurate guidance, but unexpected events may occur. By using our services, you acknowledge that our liability is limited. We focus on supporting you, helping you understand coverage, and making insurance easier to manage.

INDEMNIFICATION.TITLE: Indemnification Clause
INDEMNIFICATION.P1: By using the website or our services, you agree to protect A-State Insurance from claims caused by: false information, misuse of the website, or breaking these Terms. This keeps our services safe and fair for all users. We aim to maintain trust and transparency while supporting your insurance needs.

CHANGES.TITLE: Changes to Terms
CHANGES.P1: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the website or services means you accept the latest version. We encourage you to review these Terms regularly.

GOVERNING.TITLE: Governing Law
GOVERNING.P1: This section establishes that Texas law governs all agreements, interactions, and disputes between you and A-State Insurance. This means that if any legal issues arise, such as disagreements regarding coverage, claims, payments, or the use of our website, they will be resolved in accordance with the laws of the State of Texas. Specifically, this includes:
GOVERNING.POINT1: Insurance Code of Texas, which sets the rules for insurance agencies, brokers, and carriers operating in Texas.
GOVERNING.POINT2: Texas Business and Commerce Laws, covering contracts, payments, and business practices.
GOVERNING.POINT3: Consumer Protection Laws, ensuring clients are treated fairly and protected against deceptive practices.

INTRODUCTION.TITLE: Introduction
INTRODUCTION.DESCRIPTION: This Privacy Policy explains how A-State Insurance collects, uses, and protects personal information obtained through our website and services. We are committed to respecting your privacy and maintaining the confidentiality of your data. This policy applies to website visitors, customers, and individuals who submit information through forms or communications. By using our website, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

INFORMATION_COLLECT.TITLE: Information We Collect
INFORMATION_COLLECT.PERSONAL_DESC: We may collect personal details that you voluntarily provide, including:
INFORMATION_COLLECT.PERSONAL_NOTE: This information is collected when you contact us, request quotes, or use our services.
INFORMATION_COLLECT.AUTO_DESC: When you visit our website, certain data is collected automatically, including:
INFORMATION_COLLECT.AUTO_NOTE: This information helps us understand how visitors use our website and improve performance.

HOW_COLLECT.TITLE: How We Collect Information
HOW_COLLECT.DESCRIPTION: We collect information when you submit website contact or quote request forms, and when you communicate with us by phone, text, or email. We also collect information through cookies and similar tracking technologies that support website functionality and measure site usage.

HOW_USE.TITLE: How We Use Your Information
HOW_USE.DESCRIPTION: We use your information to respond to questions, provide customer support, and deliver insurance services and related information. It may also be used to send service updates or messages connected to your request. In addition, we use data to maintain and improve website performance, understand user behavior, and meet legal or regulatory obligations.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION: Our website uses cookies and similar tools to support basic functions and understand how visitors use our pages. These technologies help with analytics, navigation, and performance. We may use third-party tools, such as Google Analytics, to collect and report data. You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings, but some parts of the website may not work properly if cookies are turned off.

SHARING.TITLE: Information Sharing & Disclosure
SHARING.DESCRIPTION: We do not sell personal information. We may share limited information with insurance carriers and service providers when it is necessary to deliver quotes, coverage, or related services. We may also disclose information to legal or regulatory authorities if required by law. Any third party that receives information is expected to protect and use it only for the intended purpose.

SECURITY.TITLE: Data Security
SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: We use reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or misuse. Even with strong protections, no online transmission or storage system can be guaranteed as fully secure. For this reason, information is shared at your discretion.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Privacy Rights
RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: You may request access to the personal information we have about you, ask for corrections, or request deletion where allowed by law. You may also opt out of marketing or non-essential communications at any time. Texas residents may have additional rights under applicable state privacy laws.

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third-Party Links
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: Our website may include links to third-party websites for convenience. A-State Insurance does not control these sites and is not responsible for their privacy practices or content. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any external website you visit.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Children’s Privacy
CHILDREN.DESCRIPTION: Our services are not intended for children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn that a child’s information has been collected, we will take steps to remove it.

UPDATES.TITLE: Updates to This Privacy Policy
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in business practices, legal requirements, or service updates. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the “Last Updated” date will be revised accordingly. Continued use of the website indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Information
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you have questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal information, please contact us:
CONTACT.FOOTER: We are committed to addressing privacy-related inquiries promptly and responsibly.

AGENCY.MAIN_TITLE: The Agency Advantage: Where Your Work Matters
AGENCY.DESCRIPTION: Most insurance jobs feel like you're just a number in a massive corporate machine. At A-State Insurance, we do things differently. As a specialized agency and broker, we aren't tied to a single "company" script. We are entrepreneurs who represent our clients first. This means you have the freedom to find the best solutions across Auto, Home, Commercial, and Life insurance, rather than being forced to sell a one-size-fits-all product.

PILLAR1.TITLE: Texas Roots, Local Heart
PILLAR1.DESCRIPTION: We don’t serve a generic region; we serve Texas. From the bustling streets of Houston to the quiet corners of the Hill Country, our team understands the unique risks our neighbors face. When you join us, you’re helping protect the community you live in.

PILLAR2.TITLE: Inclusive by Design
PILLAR2.DESCRIPTION: Representation isn't just a buzzword here—it's our mission. We take immense pride in providing a welcoming space for everyone and are deeply committed to the Hispanic, Latino, and South Asian communities. We believe everyone deserves to understand their protection, and we’ve built our agency to ensure no one is left behind due to cultural or language barriers.

PILLAR3.TITLE: Multilingual Excellence
PILLAR3.DESCRIPTION: Communication is the bridge to trust. Our office is a hub of English, Spanish, and Hindi speakers. We celebrate that our agents can speak with a grandmother about her life insurance in Hindi or help a first-time homeowner in Spanish. Your language skills aren't just an "extra"—they are the core of how we provide world-class service.

CULTURE.TITLE: Our Culture & Values: The A-State "Vibe"
CULTURE.QUOTE: We aren’t looking for cogs in a machine. We’re looking for community advocates.
CULTURE.DESCRIPTION: In many agencies, "culture" is just a poster on the wall. For us, it's the way we handle a phone call at 4:55 PM on a Friday. We believe that if we take care of our team, our team will take care of Texas.

STAND_FOR.TITLE: What We Stand For
STAND_FOR.DESCRIPTION: Most insurance jobs feel like you're just a number in a massive corporate machine. At A-State Insurance, we do things differently. As a specialized agency and broker, we aren't tied to a single "company" script. We are entrepreneurs who represent our clients first. This means you have the freedom to find the best solutions across Auto, Home, Commercial, and Life insurance, rather than being forced to sell a one-size-fits-all product.

GROWTH.TITLE: A Growth Mindset
GROWTH.DESCRIPTION: The insurance industry is constantly evolving, and we want you to lead that change. We don’t just hire for what you know today; we invest in what you'll know tomorrow. Whether it's sponsoring your professional licensing, funding advanced insurance certifications, or providing hands-on mentorship in Commercial or Life products, your career won’t stall here. When you grow, the agency grows.

FLEXIBILITY.TITLE: Real-World Flexibility
FLEXIBILITY.DESCRIPTION: We know you have a life outside these walls. You have families, hobbies, and community commitments. We focus on results, not just "desk time." By prioritizing a healthy work-life balance, we ensure you have the energy to give your best to our clients without sacrificing the moments that matter most at home.

MISSION.TITLE: Mission-Driven Work
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: Our approach is a unique mix of informational guidance and transactional excellence. We don't just "push paper." We spend our mornings educating a first-time homebuyer on their policy and our afternoons ensuring a business owner gets their surety bond filed instantly. You’ll be a teacher, a protector, and a closer all in one day.

FORM.TITLE_LINE2: We Still Want to Meet You!

FOOTER.SLOGAN: We protect what matters to you.
